column2: Better Equipment and Discipline for the Infantry
Better Equipment and Discipline for the Cavalry
Various training grounds and barracks to improve the size and quality of Castle levies.
Improved Buildings for Cities and Temples
Better trade practices lead to more money for republics as well as cities participating in trade.
Better building techniques make construction cheaper and faster.
Better shipbuilding techniques allow us to field a bigger fleet.
Improved relations with vassal feudal lords
Our dynasty grows ever more prestigious.
Acceptance of the ways of others makes it easier to rule over people of different cultures and religions.
With clearly codified laws people are more likely to accept new rulers as rightful.
Improved farming methods result in greater income from Castle holdings.
Bigger and better walls for Castle holdings.
Improved armament for light and heavy cavalry
Encourage trade to gain more taxes from City holdings.
Improved Armour for heavy infantry and knights.
Better arms and armor for Heavy infantry and Pikemen.
Improved armament for light infantry, heavy infantry, and pikemen.
Better arms and armor for Light infantry and Archers.
Acceptance of those of a different faith.
Better tactics result in battles won with fewer losses.
Investigate new ways to wring your dues from the local Clergy.
